# DaisyUI 5 Installation and Usage Guide

## Installation
- Requires Tailwind CSS v4
- Install via npm: `npm i -D daisyui@latest`
- Note: tailwind.config.js is deprecated in Tailwind CSS v4

## Basic Setup
CSS file setup:
```css
@import "tailwindcss";
@plugin "daisyui";
```

## Alternative CDN Setup
```html
<link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/daisyui@5" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@tailwindcss/browser@4"></script>
```

## Usage Guidelines
1. Use daisyUI class names for styling HTML elements
2. Customize components with Tailwind CSS utility classes
3. Use `!` suffix for forceful style overrides (e.g., `btn bg-red-500!`)
4. Create custom components with Tailwind CSS if needed
5. Use responsive utility prefixes for layouts
6. Stick to existing daisyUI and Tailwind CSS classes

## Class Name Categories
- component: required component class
- part: child part of a component
- style: specific style settings
- behavior: behavior modifications
- color: color settings
- size: size settings
- placement: placement settings
- direction: direction settings
- modifier: general modifications
